meanings.definition: A Russian soup made with cabbage and other vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a warm bowl of shchi for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother makes delicious shchi with fresh cabbage.
meanings.sent3: The shchi danced in the pot as it cooked, filling the kitchen with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her shchi was a comforting hug in a bowl on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavors of the shchi lingered on my taste buds long after the meal was over.

meanings.definition: A type of fermented cabbage used in Russian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The tangy aroma of shchi filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: I bought a jar of homemade shchi from the farmers' market.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the jar of shchi, causing a stinky mess.
meanings.sent4: The shchi added a zesty kick to the bland dish.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy texture of the shchi added a delightful contrast to the creamy soup.
